name: Fighting Gungtor: New War Duty
description:
Fighting Gungtor: New War Duty is an ultimate action-packed commando shooting game full of FPS action and thrill. The game is based on most realistic commando shooting missions with beautiful 3D graphics and animations.

Features:
- Wide weapons arsenal guns, rifles, and more
- Amazing HD graphics with beautiful 3D environment
- Realistic and smooth control
- Multiple military missions
- Thrilling weapons sound effects
- Addictive FPS shooting experience
- Best army game look like World War games
